channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 23:47 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 23:47 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
